title: Samantha Jade makes a bold entrance in bright yellow dress at Sony's Wharf4Ward event in Sydney
text:
She's no stranger to a red carpet.

But singer Samantha Jade proved she knows how to steal the spotlight as she arrived at Sony's Wharf4Ward event on Thursday.

Wearing a bold yellow mini dress, the 32-year-old star looked dazzling as she posed for photographs.

Bold! Samantha Jade proved she knows how to steal the spotlight as she arrived at Sony's Wharf4Ward event on Thursday

Striking a pose, she flaunted her trim pins in the form-fitting off the shoulder number.

The flattering outfit featured a bustier-style neckline and ruching at the sides, while the sleeves hung around Samantha's slim arms.

Samantha wore her platinum blonde hair in soft waves, while keeping her accessories to a minimum.

She paired the dress with a pair of green open-toed stilettos.

Stunning: Wearing a bold yellow mini dress, the 32-year-old star looked dazzling as she posed for photographs

She opted for natural looking make-up, pairing bronzed cheekbones with a nude lip and feathered eyelashes.

She accessorised her red carpet look with just her glittering engagement ring.

Samantha announced her engagement to Pat Handlin, the son of Sony Music boss Denis Handlin, in January this year.

Fits like a glove! The flattering outfit featured a bustier-style neckline and ruching at the sides, while the sleeves hung around Samantha's slim arms

But last month, she admitted that she's yet to begin the wedding planning process.

The former X Factor winner recently released her latest single Bounce which was inspired by her fiancé.

The pair had been dating for well over a year before he popped the question.
description: Samantha Jade (pictured) looked dazzling as she arrived at Sony's Wharf4Ward event on Thursday.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
